articles.title: Astronomer Carl Sagan Death Anniversary: Know About The Pioneer In US Space Program And Research Of Extrasolar Planets - ABP Live
articles.description: Carl Sagan was an American astronomer known for his books and television series 'Cosmos'. He was a pioneer in NASA's US Space progam, and in astronomical research.

articles.description: After the celebrity Taiwanese-American singer announced he was divorcing his wife, she publicly accused him of infidelity and other indiscretions.
